menu_items.name: Hunan Veal
menu_items.description: veal sauteed with broccoli, mushrooms, and carrots in spicy Hunan sauce

menu_items.name: Veal with Mixed Vegetables
menu_items.description: sliced veal sauteed with carrots, broccoli, snow peas, string beans, water chestnuts, and mushrooms in brown sauce

menu_items.name: Veal with Garlic Sauce
menu_items.description: sliced veal sauteed with mushrooms, string beans, and water chestnuts in garlic sauce

menu_items.name: Kung Pao Veal
menu_items.description: sliced veal sauteed with peanuts and celery in delicious Kung Pao sauce

menu_items.name: Mongolian Veal
menu_items.description: veal sauteed with onions, green onions, and bamboo shoots in chef's sauce

menu_items.name: Veal with Green Peppers
menu_items.description: sliced veal sauteed with onions and green peppers in brown sauce

menu_items.name: Szechuan Veal
menu_items.description: veal sauteed with carrots, celery, and bean sprouts in Szechuan sauce
